statements: SELECT * FROM waste_management_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT waste_id, weight FROM waste_management_data WHERE weight > 100
SELECT date_collected, collection_point FROM waste_management_data ORDER BY date_collected DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_management_data WHERE date_collected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT waste_id, collection_point FROM waste_management_data WHERE waste_type = 'Metal'
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, weight, date_collected, collection_point FROM waste_management_data WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY date_collected DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM waste_management_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND date_collected >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY weight ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_management_data WHERE collection_point LIKE '%Recycling%' ORDER BY waste_type ASC, date_collected DESC
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_management_data GROUP BY waste_type HAVING total_weight > 500 ORDER BY total_weight DESC
SELECT DISTINCT collection_point FROM waste_management_data WHERE date_collected BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY collection_point ASC
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM WasteCollection WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT waste_id, collection_date FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_method FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_cost < 500;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_weight > 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT waste_type, collection_date FROM WasteCollection WHERE waste_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY collection_weight DESC;
SELECT waste_id, SUM(collection_weight) AS total_weight FROM WasteCollection GROUP BY waste_id HAVING total_weight > 500;
SELECT wc.waste_type, wd.disposal_date, wd.disposal_method FROM WasteCollection wc INNER JOIN WasteDisposal wd ON wc.waste_id = wd.waste_id WHERE wd.disposal_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date FROM waste_collection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_weight FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_weight > 100;
SELECT recycling_id, recycling_date, recycled_material FROM waste_recycling WHERE quantity_recycled >= 500 ORDER BY recycling_date ASC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection ORDER BY collection_date DESC, collection_weight ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT disposal_location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_location LIKE '%waste%' AND disposal_location NOT LIKE '%dump%' ORDER BY disposal_location ASC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collection_weight FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_weight > 100 ORDER BY collection_weight DESC;
SELECT recycling_date, recycled_material, quantity_recycled FROM waste_recycling WHERE quantity_recycled BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY recycling_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM waste_collection JOIN waste_recycling ON waste_collection.collection_id = waste_recycling.recycling_id WHERE waste_recycling.quantity_recycled > 75 ORDER BY waste_collection.collection_date ASC, waste_recycling.recycling_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT center_name, location FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT waste_type FROM WasteTypes WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CollectionRecords WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities WHERE facility_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM WasteFacilities WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT * FROM WasteTypes WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE center_id IN ('98765432-9876-5432-9876-543298765432', '87654321-8765-4321-8765-432187654321');
SELECT * FROM waste_recycling_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM waste_recycling_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT id, center_name, capacity FROM waste_recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_logs WHERE collected_weight >= 500 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT route_id, route_description FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE route_distance < 50 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 1000
SELECT center_name, location FROM waste_recycling_centers WHERE id = 1
SELECT route_description, route_distance FROM waste_collection_routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC
SELECT disposal_date, disposed_weight FROM waste_disposal_logs WHERE site_id = 3
SELECT log_id, collection_date FROM waste_collection_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY collection_date ASC
